alert.note: Alert for Hartford; Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 9:51AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Windham, Tolland, eastern Hartford, southwestern Worcester and southeastern Hampden Counties through 1045 AM EDT... At 951 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Somers to Vernon to Glastonbury. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Hartford, New Britain, West Hartford, Manchester, East Hartford, Enfield, Southington, Glastonbury, Newington, Vernon, Windsor, Wethersfield, Mansfield, South Windsor, Windham, Bloomfield, Berlin, Rocky Hill, Willimantic and Southbridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EDT for northern Connecticut...and western and central Massachusetts.
